name: The Adventures of the Comet Crackers
name_original: The Adventures of the Comet Crackers
description:
The Adventure of the Comet Crackers is a Third Person shooter game that I created with my own Blender assets and C# scripts for a Semester long University Module. 

You play the role of Captain Eugene Steele, an elite space soldier and a member of the 'Comet Crackers'. You are sent to locate a missing team of your colleagues on a disintegrating asteroid, but you may not like what you find in this cold, desolate rock.

( Developed October-December 2021 - All assets are original )
